content:
I submitted a pull request a month ago and it hasn't yet been reviewed, should I figure out how to switch to a different reviewer, ping them again, or just wait longer? How long should I expect to wait?

https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/83917
@Jacob Lifshay 2 weeks is usually the max - it didn't get caught by triage because you pinged the reviewer
It should come up in the next couple days, or you can ping again
@Jacob Lifshay hey, sorry. we're a bit low on review capacity lately. i usually try to review things on wednesdays, including today. i'll get to your PR shortly.

Mara said:

Jacob Lifshay hey, sorry. we're a bit low on review capacity lately. i usually try to review things on wednesdays, including today. i'll get to your PR shortly.

Thanks!
